title: Write a Progress Note
description: A resident physician needs to write a SOAP (Subjective, Objective, Assessment, Plan) note for a patient they have just examined.

tasks.description: Open the patient's chart and create a new note.
tasks.expected_outcome: Resident opens the correct patient record and selects the 'Progress Note' template.

tasks.description: Document the subjective, objective, assessment, and plan sections of the note.
tasks.expected_outcome: Resident accurately and completely documents their findings and clinical reasoning.

tasks.description: Sign the note and route it to the attending physician for co-signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Resident signs the note, and it appears in the attending's inbox for review and co-signature.
